title: Fake IT Support Calls Trick Microsoft Teams Users into Installing Ransomware
description: Cybercriminals pose as IT support, using fake calls and Microsoft Teams messages to trick users into installing ransomware through email floods and remote access.
content: Cybersecurity researchers at Trend Micro are warning about a new scam where cybercriminals pose as tech support to gain access to victims’ computers. But this isnt just another spam email scheme; att… [+3436 chars]

title: First cyclone crossing in 50 years to bring major flooding, destructive winds
description: With Tropical Cyclone Alfred set to make landfall, being the first to do so in over 50 years, torrential rain and winds above 125 kilometres per hour are set to shortly follow.
content:
South-east Queensland and north-east New South Wales are bracing for the first tropical cyclone to make landfall since Zoe and Wanda in 1974.
While multiple systems, including Nancy in 1990, glanced… [+6653 chars]

title: Why Tropical Cyclone Alfred is so dangerous despite being only a Category 2 storm
description: The cyclone categories only rank storms based on wind speeds, but don't take into account storm surges and flooding risks.
content:
Tropical Cyclone Alfred is expected to make landfall somewhere between Queensland's Sunshine Coast and Gold Coast in the early hours of Friday morning.
